title: Uber users in the United States 2017 , by device
summary: This is a bar chart representing Device in the x axis and Number of visits in the y axis.
The Number of visits is highest at Device Smartphone and lowest at Device Tablet.
There is a difference of 16.5 between the maximum Device Smartphone and minimum Device Tablet.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Device, and Number of visits in each Device on the y axis.
The maximum Number of visits 17.7 is found at Device Smartphone and the minimum is found at Tablet where Device is 1.2.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Device in the x axis and Number of visits in the y axis.
The Number of visits is highest at Device Smartphone and lowest at Device Tablet.
There is a difference of 16.5 between the maximum Device Smartphone and minimum Device Tablet.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of visits for 4 number of Devices.
The maximum Number of visits 17.7 is found at Device Smartphone and the minimum is found at Tablet where Device is 1.2.
The highest Device Smartphone has 16.5 more Number of visits than the lowest Device Tablet.
Number of visits at Device Smartphone is 17.7 , second place is Mobile-only at 16.6, and thirdly is Desktop at 6.8.
The average Number of visits in all 4 Devices is 10.57.
